content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tbClientes (
	[Prop_0] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_1] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_2] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_3] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_4] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_5] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_6] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_7] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_8] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_9] nvarchar(4000),
	[Prop_10] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'pdv/Clientes/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw.tbClientes
GO
